function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Risk of NPL/L increase in the 'emergency stage' due to unpredictable negative shock to GDP","Impact":"Increased NPL/L for riskier banks during the 'emergency stage'","Mitigation":"Increase credit guarantee ratio to help SMEs survive in the 'emergency stage'","Technologies":"Bank financing power, credit guarantee systems","People":"SMEs in ASEAN","Owner":"Banks, policy-makers"},{"Description":"Differential behavior of banks in the 'new normal' stage in response to GDP reduction","Impact":"Differential NPL/L response in different countries, with positive reaction in Malaysia","Mitigation":"Adaptation and adjustment of credit guarantee ratio based on country-specific response patterns","Technologies":"Banking and financial systems, data analysis","People":"Banks, policy-makers","Owner":"Banks, policy-makers"},{"Description":"Magnitude of bank responses in the 'exit stage'","Impact":"Magnitude of bank responses in the 'exit stage' is less than in the 'emergency stage'","Mitigation":"Gradual lessening of credit guarantee ratio as banks reach better adaption to the shock","Technologies":"Banking and financial systems, risk assessment tools","People":"SMEs in ASEAN","Owner":"Banks, policy-makers"}]}
